analyzed: ces rjod cing nga rgyal byed

analyzed: rdul tshon gyi cho ga zhag sbrel du byed ba nyin snga ma rnams la de kho na dang nub tha ma la

original: be g+aa kra ma yam /
analyzed: be g+aa kra ma yam

analyzed: zhes ba ye shes kyi khor lo nam mkhar degs nas

analyzed: gtong rag gi mchod bstod dang bzod gsol byed nas

analyzed: khyod kyis sems can don kun badzada

analyzed: sogs kyi mthar

analyzed: de nas dbang ldan nas brtsams te gtso bo gnas kyi ba rim gyis phyags la cung zad gzhan la sbyin

analyzed: lnga ba sngo ba shis rjod byed ba ni

analyzed: bla ma yi dam lha tshogs dgongs su gsol

analyzed: deng dir brtson ba sgrub ba dge ba dang dus gsum bsags dang yod ba dge ba rnams

analyzed: deng nas byang chub snying por mchis kyi ba

analyzed: dbang gis smiin cing dam tshig sdom ba ldan

analyzed: rim gnyis lam la snyen sgrub mthar phyin te

analyzed: sems kyi gyu ba rang rig du ma byed

analyzed: nyams chag rtogs sgrib ma spong gnas su dag

analyzed: phyi nang gsang ba dbyer med rtogs ba skongs

analyzed: gang char rang grol kun bzang klong yangs su

analyzed: ngan gro dong sprug srid zhi mnyam gyur cig

analyzed: thig le chen por sku dang zhing khams rdzogs

analyzed: yid la smon ba mtha dag grub gyur cig

analyzed: rgyal ba ston ba dar zhing rgya ba dang ston dzin rnams kyi bzhed ba don kun grub

analyzed: ma lus skye rgu gal rkyen kun zhi zhing

analyzed: phun tshogs mtha dag yid bzhin byor gyur cig

analyzed: ces dang gzhan yang shis rjod dang dga ston byed ba sogs mtha rgya kyi cho ga rnams gsang ba spyi gros bzhin shes ba byed

original: gsum pa rigs bsdus /
analyzed: gsum ba rigs sdud

analyzed: bzhi ba gzhan la sbyor ba

original: dang po ni /
analyzed: dang po ni

original: glang po che rab 'bogs kyi rtog pa gcig khol du phyungs pa dri med bshags pa'i rgyud nyid kyi don gu rus mdzad pa'i gdams ngag gi las tho sogs kyis bkral ba dang / gnyis pa ni /
analyzed: glang po che rab bogs kyi rtogs ba gcig khol du phyungs ba dri med chags ba brgyud nyid kyi don gu rus mdzad ba doms ngag gi las tho sogs kyis bkral ba dang gnyis ba ni

original: bshags rgyud du zhi khro'i le'u gsungs tshul gyi go rim bzhin sgrub pa dang / gsum pa ni /
analyzed: chags brgyud du zhi khro leu gsungs tshul gyi go rim bzhin sgrub ba dang gsum ba ni

original: yi ge brgya ba dbang mchog rgyal po'i rgyud la brten pa ste gzhan du bshad pa ltar dang / bzhi pa ni /

original: sgyu 'phrul zhi khro'am /
analyzed: sgyu phrul zhi khro

original: yang dag zhi khro sogs bkol rgyud 'dis kha skong ba ste /
analyzed: yang dag zhi khro sogs khol brgyud dis kha skong ba ste

original: de dag kyang bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhis 'ching ba dang / gleng gzhi bdun gyis mching ba sogs lugs tha dad par grags kyang /
analyzed: de dag kyang snyen sgrub yan lag bzhis ching ba dang gleng gzhi bdun gyis mching ba sogs lugs tha dad ba grags kyang

original: don gyi gnad gcig tu 'bab pa lta bur yod cing /
analyzed: don gyi gnad gcig tu bab ba lta bur yod cing

original: dbang bka' dang byin rlabs kyi rgyun yang chad med du yod bzhin pa yin kyang /
analyzed: dbang bka dang byin rlabs kyi rgyun yang chad med du yod bzhin ba yin kyang

original: 'dir bkod de thams cad las kyang phul du byung ba'i ngo mtshar dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: dir bkod de thams cad las kyang bul du byung ba ngo mtshar dang ldan ba yin te

original: gang la brten bya'i rgyud kyi dngos su bstan pa'i don la 'byor zhing ma 'khrugs pa dang / de'i gsal byed slob dpon gyis mdzad pa'i man ngag sum cu rtsa drug pa'i nang tshan man ngag nyer bzhi pa sogs rgya bod kyi gzhung rnying khungs tshad du mas gsal por bkral ba dang /
analyzed: gang la rten byed brgyud kyi dngos su ston ba don la byor zhing ma khrugs ba dang de gsal byed slob dpon gyis mdzad ba man ngag sum cu rtsa drug ba nang tshan man ngag nyer bzhi ba sogs rgya bod kyi gzhung rnying khungs tshad du mas gsal por bkral ba dang

original: dpal sangs rgyas gsang ba'i man ngag bi ma la dang gnyags lo nas brgyud pa'i bka' srol nyams pa med pa'i dngos bstan nyid de /
analyzed: dpal sangs rgya gsang ba man ngag bi ma la dang gnyeg lo nas brgyud ba bka srol nyams ba med ba dngos ston nyid de

original: zur pa yab sras dang / glan dang / g.yung ston chen po sogs tshad mar grub pa'i sngags 'chang chen po brgyud mar byon pa rnams kyi phyag bzhes kyi gtso bo yang 'di la mdzad pa dang / brgyud pa'i khyad par du ma'i dbang gi bka' ma chad pa'i byin rlabs kyi chu bo'i rgyun yang 'dus che ba dang /
analyzed: zur ba yab sras dang glan dang g.yung ston chen po sogs tshad mar grub ba sngags chang chen po brgyud mar byon ba rnams kyi phyag bzhes kyi gtso bo yang di la mdzad ba dang brgyud ba khyad ba du ma dbang gi bka ma chad ba byin rlabs kyi chu bo rgyun yang du che ba dang

original: cho ga'i khrigs bkod kyang tshig don ma 'dzings shing rnam par gsal ba dang / lag len gyi 'jug pa bde ba sogs khyad par du gyur pa yin mod kyi /
analyzed: cho ga khrigs bkod kyang tshig don ma dzings shing rnam ba gsal ba dang lag len gyi jug ba bde ba sogs khyad ba du gyur ba yin mod kyi

original: 'on kyang las khrigs gzhung rnying rnams ni ha cang bsdus shing mi gsal ba dang / bar skabs su byon pa'i mkhas pa dag gis mdzad pa yang lugs srol tha dad pa'i nang gses cung zad 'dres pa ltar snang ba dang / 'ga' zhig ni ha cang rgyas ches pa dang yig sna mang du bsdus pas snying po'i don la sgrib pa sogs dus mtha'i 'gro ba la phan pa che bar ma mthong nas /
analyzed: n kyang las khrigs gzhung rnying rnams ni ha cang sdud shing mi gsal ba dang ba skabs su byon ba mkhas ba dag gis mdzad ba yang lugs srol tha dad ba nang gses cung zad dre ba ltar snang ba dang ga jig ni ha cang rgya ches ba dang yig sna mang du sdud ba snying po don la sgrib ba sogs dus mtha gro ba la phan ba che ba ma mthong nas

original: 'dir bkod gang la brten bya'i khungs dang 'byor zhing snying po'i don tshang la 'dril ba dang / kha skong bar 'os pa rnams kyang cho ga nang mthun pa rnams kyis don thob ji ltar yod pa bzhin bskangs nas bklag chog gtsang dag tu byas pa yin la /
analyzed: dir bkod gang la rten byed khungs dang byor zhing snying po don tshang la dril ba dang kha skong ba s ba rnams kyang cho ga nang mthun ba rnams kyis don thob ji ltar yod ba bzhin skong nas klog chog gtsang dag tu byed ba yin la

original: spyir 'di nyid yo ga rnam pa gsum ka dang 'brel ba'i gsang ba spyi'i cho ga lta bu yin mod kyang /
analyzed: spyir di nyid yo ga rnam ba gsum ka dang brel ba gsang ba spyi cho ga lta bu yin mod kyang

original: khyad par lung a nu yo ga'i nang tshan du gnas pa ste /
analyzed: khyad ba lung a nu yo ga nang tshan du gnas ba ste

original: go don dang lag len gyi zur 'debs phyogs mthong tsam zhig 'chad par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: go don dang lag len gyi zur debs phyogs mthong tsam jig chad ba yang gyur ro

original: na rag dong sprugs rnal 'byor spyi khrus kyi //
analyzed: na rag dong sprug rnal byor spyi khru kyi

original: rnam dag cho ga'i sgrub thabs zla med pas //
analyzed: rnam dag cho ga sgrub thabs zla med ba

original: 'jigs rung 'khor ba'i mtsho las 'gro ba kun //
analyzed: jigs rung khor ba mtsho las gro ba kun

original: thar mchog zhing du sgrol byed 'di kho na //
analyzed: thar mchog zhing du sgrol byed di kho na

original: srid mtsho brgal ba'i thabs las gzhan gyur pa'i //
analyzed: srid mtsho rgol ba thabs las gzhan gyur ba

original: 'dod don bsgrub bya thar 'dod rnams la med //
analyzed: dod don sgrub byed thar dod rnams la med

original: de phyir rnam dag myur ba'i lam bzang gi //
analyzed: de phyir rnam dag myur ba lam bzang gi

original: thabs tshul 'di la kun tu 'bad pa gces //
analyzed: thabs tshul di la kun tu bad ba gces

original: rgyud don man ngag lag len ldan pa'i khrigs //
analyzed: brgyud don man ngag lag len ldan ba khrigs

original: phyogs tsam brjod pa'i dge ba gang thob des //
analyzed: phyogs tsam rjod ba dge ba gang thob des

original: 'gro kun srid zhi'i mtha' las rnam grol ba'i //
analyzed: gro kun srid zhi mtha las rnam grol ba

original: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang 'thob phyir ba sngo //
analyzed: rdzogs sangs rgya kyi go phen thob phyir ba sngo

original: na rag dong sprugs rnal 'byor gyi spyi khrus chen po'i cho ga 'khor ba kun sgrol zhes bya ba 'di ni /
analyzed: na rag dong sprug rnal byor gyi spyi khru chen po cho ga khor ba kun sgrol zhes byed ba di ni

original: rtse le chos rje mthu stobs rnam par rgyal ba dang / mdo khams go 'jo ba sdom brtson shes rab 'od zer sogs don gnyer can du mas snga phyir nan tan du bskul ba las /
analyzed: rtse le chos rje mthu stobs rnam ba rgyal ba dang mdo khams go jo ba sdom brtson shes rab d zer sogs don gnyer can du mas snga phyir nan tan du skul ba las

original: rig pa 'dzin pa 'gyur med rdo rjes rang lo zhe dgu pa la o rgyan smin grol gling gi dge gnas su sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni mkhan chen lo ts+aa ba d+harma sh+r+ai'o //
analyzed: rig ba dzin ba gyur med rdo rjes rang lo zhe dgu ba la o rgyan smin grol gling gi dge gnas su sbyor ba yi ge ba ni mkhan chen lo ts+aa ba d+harma sh+r+ai
